mapper.insert: insert into plan (username, title, departure, days, plans) values (#{username}, #{title}, #{departure}, #{days}, #{plans})
mapper.select: select * from plan where username = #{username} order by regdate desc
select count(*) from plan where pub = 1

select * from ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM ( select plan.*, (select count(*) from plan_good where plan_no = plan.idx) good from plan where pub = 1 order by good desc ) a ) WHERE rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 3
